meanings.definition: The arrangement of parts or elements in a particular form or structure.
meanings.sent1: The toy blocks were in a unique configuration on the floor.
meanings.sent2: The computer's configuration was optimized for speed and efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The configuration of toppings on the pizza made it look like a smiley face.
meanings.sent4: The stars in the night sky formed a beautiful configuration that resembled a constellation.
meanings.sent5: The intricate configuration of gears in the clock fascinated the young child.

meanings.definition: The way in which components are arranged or set up.
meanings.sent1: The seating configuration in the classroom encouraged group work.
meanings.sent2: The network's configuration allowed for seamless data transfer.
meanings.sent3: The unusual configuration of books on the shelf made it hard to find a specific title.
meanings.sent4: The configuration of colors in the painting created a sense of harmony.
meanings.sent5: The intricate configuration of wires in the machine required careful assembly.
